text: Ernst Carl Julius Albrecht (19 June 1930 â€“ 13 December 2014) was a German politician. He was a member of the Christian Democratic Union. He was a former civil servant of the European Commission. He served as Prime Minister of the state of Lower Saxony from 1976 to 1990. His daughter, Ursula von der Leyen, is the President of the European Commission. Albrecht died on 13 December 2014 from Alzheimer's disease, aged 84. == References == == Other websites == Category:1930 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Politicians of the Christian Democratic Union of Germany Category:Ministers-President of Lower Saxony Category:Politicians from Heidelberg
title: Ernst Albrecht
